name: Spellpowder: Uprising demo
description:
Spellpowder: Uprising is an upcoming strategy RPG set in fantasy steampunk setting. Lead your squad to victory trough wide streets, dark forests and cold snow lands. Level up, equip, promote your troops and lead them carefully (or not) in upcoming battles.

This is battle gameplay demo. You will lead a squad of 4 members in one game level.

If you liked the demo or have any tips to make the game better, feel free to join discord server and wishlist it on steam
